DOC.brief_summary: This qualitative study explores how patients deal with the side effects from chemotherapy at their home, what factors and ideas influence their symptom self-management and how professional caregivers contribute to the management of their symptoms at home. Data are collected through semi-structured interviews with adult patients treated with chemotherapy and analysed using a Grounded Theory approach.
DOC.brief_title: A Qualitative Study Into How Patients Deal With Chemotherapy-related Side Effects at Home
